players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Oh no, Alice is dead! I was so sure she was the detective. This is a huge blow for the town."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana, it's unfortunate that Alice is dead. Let's stay focused and try to identify the mafia among us. We can't let them continue eliminating our town members."
You: "Diana, you just claimed Alice was the detective. How did you know her role?"
You: "Diana, you claimed Alice was the detective. Only the mafia would know that for sure. I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso."
Charlie: "I'm shocked by the turn of events. With Alice out of the game, it's more important than ever that we work together to identify the mafia among us. We can't let them go unchecked."
